RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 71. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race Since June 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadvisable by manageme nt to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at Five Furlongs.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ON OUR WAY BOYZ stalked the pace and made a three wide bid by the quarter pole, hit the front nearing the furlong marker and edged clear, then held off FIERCE AND STRONG late to prove best, driving. FIERCE AND STRONG chased the pace on the inside, then finished well up the inside but was too late. LITTLE J P was away alertly to set the paced while clear, raced in the two path on the turn and faded the final furlong, bested rest. LOVE ME ARCHIE was outrun early, advanced on the inside on the turn and had no late rally. KNOCKDOWN KID chased the pace three wide and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Little J P
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, 2 wide turn, faded 1/8, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Love Me Archie
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, inside turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: On Our Way Boyz
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 3 wide, edged clear, held, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Fierce and Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, saved ground turn, finished well inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Knockdown Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 15400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 7 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs . (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course it will be run on the main t rack at One Mile. Ifmore than 10 horses remain it will be run at One Mile and Seventy Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MINE TO HOLD rated inside early, made a three wide move on the turn to be clear by the quarter pole, drew off leaving the turn and then was wrapped up late to prove much the best. CASTAGNO was settled back early, swung out five wide leaving the turn and rallied well on the outside, second best. DRONE SWARM was rank on the first turn, settled on the backstretch and dropped to the inside, made a four wide bid by the quarter pole, but weakened, held show award. LEAVE 'EM LOADED chased the early pace four wide, then dropped back and moved to the inside on the turn, and missed the show award. AMERICAN NIGHTMARE was settled back early, then was climbing on the backstretch while four wide, then came wide into the lane and had no rally. BOOM BOOM KABOOM pressed the pace and amde a inside bid on the backstretch to take over at the half mile marker and then tired. DRAMATIZED was away alertly to set a pressured pace on the first turn two wide, then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Mine to Hold
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, 3 wide move, drew off, wrapped up late

ENTRY.NAME: Boom Boom Kaboom
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, bid backstretch, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Drone Swarm
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank first turn, settled, bid 4 wide 1/4, flattened out, held 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Castagno
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, swung out 5 wide, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Dramatized
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace 2 wide, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Leave 'Em Loaded
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4 wide, dropped back, inside turn, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: American Nightmare
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, climbing backstretch, came wide, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Suc h A Race Since May 7 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course it will be run on the main track at One Mile. If more than 10 horses remain it will be run at One Mile and Seventy Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMUSING MISCHIEF was away alertly to set the pace while clear on the inside, drew out on the turn and then was kept to right handed crop urging to remain well clear to prove best. SAMARONTI was allowed to settle early, made a four wide move by the quarter pole, had no late kick but held the place award between rivals late. DEVOTED KITTEN was void of early speed, came five wide into the lane and had a later rally to just miss the place award. SACHMO stalked the pace three wide and weakened, missed show award. FED CHAIR tracked the pace on the inside and weakened. MEAN MACHINE was four wide into the first turn, then dropped to the inside on the backstretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Fed Chair
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Devoted Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, came 5 wide, late rally outside

ENTRY.NAME: Amusing Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set unchallenged pace inside, drew out, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Samaronti
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide move 1/4, got 2nd between late

ENTRY.NAME: Sachmo
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, weakened, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Machine
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, inside backstretch, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 7 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 7 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOBEER was away alertly to set the pace while clear and off the inside, shook clear leaving the turn sand then held sway late to prove best, driving. UNCLE DAR reluctant to load, then was bumped at the start, stalked the winner three wide, came four wide into the lane and was gaining late, second best. MITROPANOS was rated along three wide, and lacked the needed winning bid, got show award. OVER AND THUNDER tracked the pace on the inside and weakened. SANTO was outrun early and lacked a rally. MACHO HONCHO was settled early and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Over and Thunder
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Dar
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load,bumped start, stalked pace 3 wide, gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: Santo
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Mitropanos
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 3 wide, needed bid, got 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Macho Honcho
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Mobeer
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set unchallenged pace, off rail, shook clear, held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 72. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lb s.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 7 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 7 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KILIMANJARA was bumped at the start, chased the pace on the inside, shifted out and made a four wide bid by the quarter pole, then had a long drive with NAIL POLISH and prevailed late to prove best under a drive. NAIL POLISH pressed the pace three wide, made a bid by the quarter pole and was between rivals leaving the turn, then had a long drive with the winner but was outkicked to just miss. HOT FUDGE WARRIOR set a pressured pace on the inside and weakened in the drive, bested rest. MORGANS COVE broke outwardly at the start bumping his barn mate, then reserved early towards the inside, swung out five wide leaving the turn, lugged in by the furlong marker and had no rally. DESI'S REWARD stalked the pace three wide and weakened. SONG SAVER failed to respond. UNION RALLY was settled early and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Fudge Warrior
ENTRY.OWNER: Two Ten Twelve Triple T Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, weakened 1/8, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Nail Polish
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, between upper, out-kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Desi's Reward
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Union Rally
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Morgans Cove
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bumped foe, reserved inside, swung 5 wide, lug in

ENTRY.NAME: Kilimanjara
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased inside, bid 4 wide, long drive, prevailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Song Saver
ENTRY.OWNER: Pewter Stable and Shooting Star Stable (Anspach)
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 28900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-win ners Of A Race Since June 7 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 7 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAFFA'S DAY was away alertly to vie for the lead on the outsider of a trio, made a bid on the turn to be clear by the quarter pole, then drew off in the lane to prove much the best under a drive. PRIVET MOON vied for the lead on the inside, fell off the pace by the quarter pole, swung out five wide leaving the turn and finished willingly to be clearly second best. DON'T LOSEMYMONEY stalked the early pace two wide, shifted out and was four wide by the quarter pole, came five wide into the lane and was empty, bested rest. UPSTATE AND BACK was reserved early, inside on the turn and had no rally. MARTINKELLY vied for the lead in between rivals and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Privet Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, swung out 5 wide, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Losemymoney
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 2 wide, shift 4 wide 1/4, empty, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Martinkelly
ENTRY.OWNER: Two Ten Twelve Triple T Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead between horses, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Saffa's Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied outside, bid 3 wide, clear 1/4, drew off lane

ENTRY.NAME: Upstate and Back
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, inside turn, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAMMA KATZ was bumped at the start, moved up to press the pace from between rivals, then vied for command between rivals on the turn, made a bid to gain a short lead leaving the furlong marker, then prevailed late, driving. UPTOWN SERAPHINA pressed the early pace three wide, then vied for the lead on the outside on the turn, then finished willingly but was outkicked by the winner, clearly second best. RENT CONTROL set a pressured pace on the inside, then vied for the lead on the inside on the turn, weakened in the drive, held show award. TRECHMO GIRL was outrun early, came three wide into the lane and had a belated rally to gain the last spot in the superfecta. MISS MIA LIA was outrun early, saved ground on the turn and passed the tiring rivals. TRAJEC HOLIDAY broke outwardly at the start bumping a rival, then was close up early, tracked the pace on the inside on the turn and was empty. TELL ME IM AWESOME chased the pace four wide and came wide into the lane and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Rent Control
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, vied inside turn, weakened, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Mia Lia
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, inside turn, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Trechmo Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, came 3 wide upper stretch, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Trajec Holiday
ENTRY.OWNER: Albright George R and Hughes Alfred A
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outwardly, bumped foe, close up early, inside turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Mamma Katz
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed between, vied between, bid, prevailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown Seraphina
ENTRY.OWNER: Strunk John L Strunk Theresa A Baxter Ted R and Baxter Susan G
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, vied outside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Tell Me Im Awesome
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, came wide, weakened,
